snippet.title: NEW GAME! Mythic Legends | Get Ready to Join the Fight (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
It's time to enter the arena in Mythic Legends! Download and play the brand new strategy RPG now: https://hyds.app/ml_t003_pre-reg_yt_description_en

Have you got what it takes to craft the ultimate battle strategy? Prove it. 
Build and command ferocious armies of Champions. Wield the power of the ultimate Legends. Earn and use Artifacts to boost your fighting strengths and tactics. And rise up through the ranks on your quest for epic domination.

The arena is the proving ground where the empire’s greatest warriors battle for victory. Are you going to be one of them? https://hyds.app/ml_t003_pre-reg_yt_description_en

#MythicLegends #StrategyRPG #Game

Mythic Legends, the epic strategy RPG that YOU won't be able to stop playing.

Build an army of Champions and rise to the challenge of the arena while you climb the leaderboard! With unique mechanics that let you leave and return to your epic battles whenever you want, you can unlock legendary power and craft the ultimate strategy on your path to victory. Wield the strengths and skills of beastmasters, sorcerers, knights, and more, sharpen your tactics, and choose your moves wisely. The battle is yours to win.

Enter the arena now!
🔹 Google: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hyperdotstudios.mythiclegends 
🔹 Apple app store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/mythic-legends/id1540059953

The action continues beyond the arena. 

Produced by Hyperdot Studios: https://hyperdotstudios.com/
3D Animation production by Lunar: http://www.lunaranimation.com/

Join our community of Legends! We share battle strategies, synergy tips, and more on our YouTube channel and social platforms. And the community does too. You can also subscribe to our mailing list. 

🔸 Discord: https://discord.com/channels/748828683057496084/748828683057496086
🔸 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MythicLegends/
🔸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mythiclegendsgame/
🔸 Twitter: https://twitter.com/MythicLegends_
🔸 Website: www.mythic-legends.com
🔸 Fandom: https://mythiclegends.fandom.com/wiki/Mythic_Legends_Wiki
